original_text: Eliab's descendants were Nemuel, Dathan and Abiram. Dathan and Abiram were the men who turned against Moses and Aaron. Korah was their leader and they all turned against the Lord.
korean_text: 엘리압의 아들은 느무엘과 다단과 아비람이라 이 다단과 아비람은 회중 가운데서 부름을 받은 자들이니 고라의 무리에 들어가서 모세와 아론을 거슬러 여호와께 반역할 때에

sentences.original_text: Eliab's descendants were Nemuel, Dathan and Abiram
Dathan and Abiram were the men
who turned against Moses and Aaron
and they all turned against the Lord
